subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: John Wall returned from a knee injury to collect 14 points and 4 assists in his first game of the season, and the worst-in-the-N.B.A. Washington Wizards have their first winning streak after a 93-83 home victory over the Atlanta Hawks.
